abstract: The agreement is being renegotiated after the federal government said it seemed the existing settlement would violate antitrust laws.
snippet: The agreement is being renegotiated after the federal government said it seemed the existing settlement would violate antitrust laws.
lead_paragraph: The parties to a Google book settlement that would allow the creation of a vast digital library outlined on Wednesday an aggressive timeline for modifying the agreement to satisfy objections from the Justice Department and others.

headline.main: Google to Revise a Book Pact by Nov. 9
headline.print_headline: Google to Revise a Book Pact by Nov. 9

abstract: Media6Degrees said that it has hired a former Google executive to lead the company, whose technology allows online advertisers to target their customers and those associated with them.
snippet: Media6Degrees said that it has hired a former Google executive to lead the company, whose technology allows online advertisers to target their customers and those associated with them.
lead_paragraph: Media6Degrees said Wednesday that it has hired a former Google executive to lead the company, whose technology allows online advertisers to reach their customers and the people with whom they most closely associate.

headline.main: Media6Degrees Taps Ex-Google Executive as Chief

abstract: As Google begins to see a recovery of its own, the company has begun hiring again and is looking for companies to buy — both activities that had been held in check for the last year.
snippet: As Google begins to see a recovery of its own, the company has begun hiring again and is looking for companies to buy — both activities that had been held in check for the last year.

headline.main: Economy Looks Rosier Through Google’s Glasses

abstract: Google is making a big push in the enterprise market, but a new report from Forrester Research suggests progress against Microsoft will be slow.
snippet: Google is making a big push in the enterprise market, but a new report from Forrester Research suggests progress against Microsoft will be slow.
lead_paragraph: Google‘s efforts to cater to corporate and government customers — the enterprise market — have long been seen as half-hearted. Google is a consumer company, after all, so the enterprise side of the business looked to be the poor relation.

headline.main: Google Apps: A Long Road Ahead

abstract: Google chats up New York media on book settlement, Chrome, snacks and evil.
snippet: Google chats up New York media on book settlement, Chrome, snacks and evil.
lead_paragraph: Popularity and ubiquity have their downsides: Prom queens, politicians, and yes, even huge enterprises have found out that soon after everyone develops a crush on you, the backlash will quickly follow.Google, which used to be embodied by its goofy logo letters and an origins story about a company founded in a garage that hoped to take over the world of search, is currently regarded with suspicion at its every move because it succeeded. Wildly. Now that it is huge and moving into all sorts of businesses that go beyond pure search, journalists and competitors question its every motive. And Google is determined not to get Microsoft-ed, where a company with a huge footprint in technology and culture ends up being seen as a monopolist and a threat, as opposed to an innovator.

headline.main: Chatting Up Google: Search as You Like, There Is No ‘Evil Room’
